link.description:
Click "Submit", then touch the right arrow on the router to register Freebox with Home Assistant.

![Location of button on the router](/static/images/config_freebox.png)
link.title: Link Freebox router

permission.description: You need to go connect to http://mafreebox.freebox.fr/#Fbx.os.app.settings.Accounts and add the access: "Gestion de l'alarme et maison connect√©e"
permission.title: Permission is required
